attributes.action: Screen all individuals  who present with cough and fever for COVID 19
attributes.additional_details:
Advice on self isolating for 7 days is not enough. If people are COVID -19 positive without realising how do we know that 7 days is actually enough.

It will enable more people to be kept in the workforce if they test negative and feel better well within the 7 days advice. It will also stop people abusing the 7 day isolation rule for their own purposes.

Knowing we are screening properly may well quell the anxiety currently seen in all cities, towns and shopping areas.
attributes.background:
Help to get rid of uncertainty about whether individuals are infected or not. Enable collation of accurate data :numbers infected, severity and spread. Accurate mortality statistics 
This will all help with planning for future outbreaks of disease and it is in line with WHO recommendedations

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The conduct of tests is a clinical decision for the NHS, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

We have published a petition calling for the Government to provide publicly accessible testing for coronavirus around the UK, which you might want to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301354 

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
